channel.title: Help me
channel.description:
[i][b]ok im not sure on how to package my runescape server and client into one thing that loads the client and server at the same time so that i can make it avalable to other people to play.[/b][/i]
i want it to be like the 2 speced client so that people cant leech.
[b]HOW DO I DO THIS??? [/b]

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @lo0pysno0py lo0pysno0py
item.description:
@lo0pysno0py wrote:

Why not just release your client for other people? and you run the server, and people use the client to connect, you donâ€™t have to give out the server at all.
